description: Try our easy to follow Green Bean, Chicken & Chickpea Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Green Bean, Chicken & Chickpea Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125g green beans, trimmed, cut into 3cm lengths
210g chickpeas with no added salt (rinsed, drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: Place beans in a steamer over a pan of simmering water. Cover and steam for 2-3 minutes or until just tender. Refresh under cold running water. Drain.
Combine beans, capsicum, chickpeas, chicken and feta in a large bowl. Whisk the lemon juice and olive oil together. Add to salad and gently toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate until required.
